attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sheltered Housing is a tenure choice for the elderly. With the exception of 'Extra Care' , Sheltered Housing is to disappear because of budgetary changes. May I ask the Prime Minister to reverse this vicious legislation ?

rejection.details: Petition title needs to be a request for action not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
